extends java.lang.Object

    • selectMarketRow

      protected void selectMarketRow​(int row, java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> whiteMarbleChoice, java.util.List<Resource> resourcesToDiscard) throws ResourceNotInsertableException
      Given a row in the market, returns all the resources taken from that row without the white and red ones
      Parameters:
      row - row chosen by the player
      whiteMarbleChoice - the white marble choice
      resourcesToDiscard - the resources to discard
      Throws:
      ResourceNotInsertableException - the resource not insertable exception

    • selectMarketColumn

      protected void selectMarketColumn​(int column, java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> whiteMarbleChoice, java.util.List<Resource> resourcesToDiscard) throws ResourceNotInsertableException
      Given a column in the market, returns all the resources taken from that column that can not fit in the deposits
      Parameters:
      column - column of the market chosen by the player
      whiteMarbleChoice - the white marble choice
      resourcesToDiscard - the resources to discard
      Throws:
      ResourceNotInsertableException - the resource is not insertable exception

    • handleRedAndWhiteMarbles

      protected void handleRedAndWhiteMarbles​(java.util.List<Resource> resourceList, java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> whiteMarbleChoice) throws ResourceNotInsertableException
      Handle the white and red marbles taken at the market, add faith points for the red ones and eliminate the white ones if no leader card with a special power( of white marble substitution) is active
      Parameters:
      resourceList - list of resources taken at the market, with the red and white ones
      whiteMarbleChoice - the white marble choice
      Throws:
      ResourceNotInsertableException - the resource not insertable exception

    • insertResourcesInDeposits

      protected void insertResourcesInDeposits​(int playerindex, java.util.List<Resource> resourceListParameter) throws ResourceNotInsertableException
      Insert a list of resources in the different deposits(only WAREHOUSEDEPOT+ADDITIONAL STORAGES), if they can not fit the state is changed to MARKET_DISCARD_RESOURCE
      Parameters:
      playerindex - the playerindex
      resourceListParameter - the resources to insert in the deposits(no white/red ones)
      Throws:
      ResourceNotInsertableException - the resource not insertable exception

    • distributeInitialResources

      protected abstract void distributeInitialResources​(int player, java.util.List<Resource> initialResources)
      Only needed in multiplayer mode, but defined here to avoid instanceof usage
      Parameters:
      player - the player who want to receive his initial resources
      initialResources - the initial resources
